`r insert_figure("rocky-shore_barnacles.html)`

### Acorn Barnacles (_Chthamalus dalli/fissus/Balanus glandula_) {.active}

```{r}
d_csv <- here("data/rocky-intertidal_MARINe/sanctuary_species_percentcover.csv")

plot_intertidal_nms(d_csv, "OCNMS", "CHTBAL", "Acorn Barnacles") %>%
  dyLegend(show="follow")
```

`r insert_figure("rocky-shore_barnacles.html)`

### Acorn Barnacles (_Chthamalus dalli/fissus/Balanus glandula_), target = balanus

```{r}
plot_intertidal_nms(d_csv, "OCNMS", "CHTBAL", "Acorn Barnacles [target = balanus]", c("balanus", "chthamalus_balanus")) %>% 
  dyLegend(show="follow")
```
